'''Whisper of the Heart''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to watch two nearby musicians join the other two sitting and start a street performance at [[Colomche Plaza]], [["People of the Springs"]].
